availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas George Mallory (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret Mallory. Father of Fannie Mallory, Virginia Mallory, and Wilmina Mallory. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Burnesville, p. 19.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Burnesville, p. 208B.
"Thomas George Mallory (1826-1879)," Find A Grave, Memorial #141822377, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/141822377 (accessed July 21, 2021).
